summary: An ordinance relating to the University Addition-Northlake Urban Renewal Project (Wash. R-8), authorizing a loan and grant contract with the United States of America for financial assistance in carrying out said project, and creating special funds designated "Project Expenditure Fund, Project No. Wash. R-8" and "Project Temporary Loan Repayment Fund, Project No. Wash. R-8" in such connection.
